.b-grid-header-container.title: Semi-persistent database
.b-grid-header-container.content: This demo uses a PHP backend that saves changes into the current user session. You can add, modify and delete records. When the session dies, however, the changes are lost.

.b-scheduler.title: Network requests
.b-scheduler.content: Open the Developer tools (F12) to monitor the network requests being created while scrolling
